title: Strengthening HR Management Competencies: Qualitative Study on MOOC Discourse in Online News Media

context.prior_knowledge: Introductory understanding of education policy or media analysis
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Participants can classify discourses on MOOCs in online news media into six main themes: announcements, user stages, characteristics, benefits, patterns of change, and educational inequality.
Participants can derive hidden meanings in media discourse by designing semi-structured interviews with educational experts.
Participants can analyze explicit and implicit content in news articles using Gioia methodology and Van Dijk’s ideological square model.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
